tosdr.case: The service uses your personal data to employ targeted third-party advertising

title: The service uses your personal data to employ targeted third-party advertising
quoteDoc: Cookies and Privacy Policy - About Privacy
quoteText: We fund our site by showing adverts as you browse our site. These adverts are usually managed by a partner specializing in providing adverts for multiple sites. Invariably these partners collect anonymous data about the websites you visits so they can personalize the adverts to you, ensure that you don't see the same adverts too frequently and ultimately report to advertisers on which adverts are working.
